author: Sara Harrison
title: Does Vaping Raise Your Risk of Covid-19 Symptoms?
description: There are no studies yet, but reports showing heightened dangers for tobacco smokers and lung damage from vaping are raising alarms for doctors and parents.
content: Like many parents, LeeAnn is terrified her son will catch Covid-19. She lives in New York, near the nations coronavirus epicenter, but that isnt the only issue thats worrying her. LeeAnn is especially concerned because her teenager vapes: This virus attacks t… [+5302 chars]
